title: France: attack on a police station following the death of a young man killed by a collision with a police vehicle
content: Several dozen people targeted the La Courneuve police station (Seine-Saint-Denis) Sunday evening, proceeding to major fireworks and projectile mortar shots. Reinforcements had to be deployed to secure the building. This revolt broke out following the death of a young person, killed four days earlier in a collision with a police vehicle, while it was traveling on A scooter in Aubervilliers. Nine people were arrested following these Clashes.
